Constructor Detail

Axis

public Axis(java.lang.String type)
Constructs a Axis object with the specified type.

Parameters:
type - the type, defaults to 'x'
See Also:
setType(String)
Method Detail

getType

public java.lang.String getType()
Returns the type of this axis. Available axes are:
  • x = bottom x-axis
  • t = top x-axis
  • y = left y-axis
  • r = right y-axis

Returns:
the type of this axis

setType

public void setType(java.lang.String type)
Sets the type of this axis. Available axes are:
  • x = bottom x-axis
  • t = top x-axis
  • y = left y-axis
  • r = right y-axis
Defaults to 'x' if the given type is illegal.

Parameters:
type - the type of this axis

getLabels

public java.lang.String getLabels()
Returns all labels separated by the comma(,).

Returns:
all labels separated by the comma(,)

setLabels

public void setLabels(java.lang.String labels)
Sets labels which is separated by the comma(,). The first label is placed at the start, the last at the end, others are uniformly spaced in between.

Parameters:
labels - all labels separated by the comma(,)

getPositions

public java.lang.String getPositions()
Returns all label positions separated by the comma(,). The label positions use floating point numbers for position values.

Returns:
all label positions separated by the comma(,)

setPositions

public void setPositions(java.lang.String positions)
Sets all label positions separated by the comma(,). The label positions use floating point numbers for position values.

Parameters:
positions - all label positions separated by the comma(,)
